strat: Pick all girl operators!
name: Girl power

strat: You can only be prone. No standing or crouching!
name: Worming around

strat: No Call Outs!
name: ¡Silencio!

strat: Stay outside. No going inside.
name: Play outside

strat: Everyone only gets 1 magazine with each gun!
name: Ammo is expensive!

strat: Equip an LMG, You can only hipfire.
name: Rambo

strat: You can only crawl unless with a teammate then you can run or sprint
name: Buddy system

strat: Everyone must roam together, do not separate
name: The Flock

strat: You must kill all the cameras in the map before you may kill anybody.
name: Camera, Camera on the wall

strat: You may only move when crouching.
name: Crabs!

strat: Switch your mouse hand and your keyboard hand.
name: Criss Cross

strat: You can only kill an enemy if they are in barbed wire.
name: Venus Fly Trap

strat: You must fortify the wrong objective room.
name: The Great Bamboozle!

strat: Everyone must equip a deployable shield and place them in a circle. You can not leave the circle.
name: Iron Wall

strat: The first person to die becomes the Dictator and the highest scoring operator must follow the dictator’s instructions and do nothing until told.
name: Dictator

strat: You can only enter rooms through door frames
name: Knock Knock

strat: You can’t press the D key.
name: Remember, No D.

strat: You may only move if you have the defuser. You may pass the defuser around.
name: Fearless leader

strat: Every time someone on your team dies, everyone cannot move for 5 seconds.
name: Freeze Tag

strat: Due to gun control you must use semi-auto on all weapons
name: The NFA

strat: You must aim at the enemy’s knees when shooting.
name: Kneecap

strat: Everyone must use a shotgun
name: Loud Noises

strat: Find the nearest wall and move to it, you may only move against a wall.
name: Mirror’s Edge

strat: You can’t repel.
name: Out of rope

strat: You must all use recruit.
name: Power Rangers

strat: You may only move when you are aiming down sights.
name: Tunnel Vision

strat: You can’t stop sprinting.
name: Speed

strat: You may only fire 6 times before you have to reload. (Twice if you use a shotgun)
name: The Wild West

strat: Pick Hibana, Thermite, Ash, Sledge, or Fuze. You can only use your gadgets/knife/grenades
name: Grand Opening

strat: You may only enter objective room with 15 seconds remaining.
name: Where’s the site?

strat: You must empty 50% of your magazine before you may move.
name: Over Encumbered

strat: You must only enter and exit any building through windows!
name: Window Washer

strat: All take an FBI recruit with the automatic shotgun and rush like hell.
name: Auto-Shotgun Ahoy

strat: All pick American recruits with a shield, the 5.7, smoke grenades and stun grenades. Open a window (or door) and throw all the nades. Breach.
name: The Blind Shield Wall

strat: One player picks Glaz and the rest pick a weapon with ACOG sights. You must always walk while ADS.
name: Depth Perception

strat: All pick Frag grenades.Open up the objective room and lob all of them inside. Bonus points if you have one or more LMGs shooting in there as well.
name: Tactical Bombardment

strat: You aren't allowed to fire any bullets until there are only 45 seconds left in the match (You may use gadgets/knife)
name: Waiting Game

strat: No use of drones during prep phase and throughout the round.
name: No Intel

strat: All pick Spetsnaz recruits with LMG's and charge the objective room, once in you must hip fire like crazy until everyone is eliminated... remember, no hostages.
name: No Hostages

strat: You can never enter the objective room.
name: The Room Is Lava

strat: For this, you need Glaz. Two players (not Glaz) will enter the building. The Glaz will be sniper support. When the first two die, the next go, when they die, Glaz may enter.
name: Overwatch

strat: All attack the objective room while Twitch distracts everyone in the objective room.
name: Shocker

strat: Castle fortifies doors. Kapkan traps the weaker barricades. Mute does his thing. Rook armours up team and Tachanka sets up.
name: The Fortress

strat: One person picks Tachanka, another picks Kapkan, all rest are Spetsnaz recruits. If Tachanka dies everyone must leave the room.
name: Lord Tachanka

strat: No camera usage.
name: Turn a Blind Eye

strat: Reinforce another room and place rook armor in the center of it in an attempt to trap an attacker in there via castle.
name: Capturing an Animal

strat: Search yourself a nice spot in the warmup phase, you have to stay at this spot +- 1sqm after the warmup phase. You are not allowed to leave it.
name: King Of The Spot

strat: No one gets to leave the room where the objective is, ever.
name: Spawn Camping

strat: Once attackers spawn, everyone must lay down and remain prone the rest of the game.
name: Worms

strat: Everyone must find an object to stand on and only shoot from that. If you touch the floor when the round has started you must kill yourself since the floor is lava.
name: Lava Floor

strat: All defensive operators grab a shield and form a circle large enough to fit all five members inside surrounding the hostage. After the preparation phase, everyone must stay inside of the circle to defend the hostage.
name: Claustrophobic

strat: One person must pick Rook. Everyone needs to kill an enemy before they are worthy to pick up armor
name: To Be Worthy

strat: When the attack phase starts, stand in a circle around the hostage and don't move.
name: Cotton Wool
